2671 if (num_ssid > max_sched_scan_ssids) {
2672 wpa_printf(MSG_DEBUG, "PNO: Use only the first %u SSIDs from "
2673 "%u", max_sched_scan_ssids, (unsigned int) num_ssid);
2674 num_ssid = max_sched_scan_ssids;
2675 }
2676
2677 if (num_match_ssid > wpa_s->max_match_sets) {
2678 num_match_ssid = wpa_s->max_match_sets;
2679 wpa_dbg(wpa_s, MSG_DEBUG, "PNO: Too many SSIDs to match");
2680 }
2681 params.filter_ssids = os_calloc(num_match_ssid,
2682 sizeof(struct wpa_driver_scan_filter));
2683 if (params.filter_ssids == NULL)
2684 return -1;
2685
2686 i = 0;
2687 prio = 0;
2688 ssid = wpa_s->conf->pssid[prio];
2689 while (ssid) {
2690 if (!wpas_network_disabled(wpa_s, ssid)) {
2691 if (ssid->scan_ssid && params.num_ssids < num_ssid) {
2692 params.ssids[params.num_ssids].ssid =
2693 ssid->ssid;
2694 params.ssids[params.num_ssids].ssid_len =
2695 ssid->ssid_len;
2696 params.num_ssids++;
2697 }
2698 os_memcpy(params.filter_ssids[i].ssid, ssid->ssid,
2699 ssid->ssid_len);
2700 params.filter_ssids[i].ssid_len = ssid->ssid_len;
2701 params.num_filter_ssids++;
2702 i++;
2703 if (i == num_match_ssid)
2704 break;
2705 }
2706 if (ssid->pnext)
2707 ssid = ssid->pnext;
2708 else if (prio + 1 == wpa_s->conf->num_prio)
2709 break;
2710 else
2711 ssid = wpa_s->conf->pssid[++prio];
2712 }
2713
2714 if (wpa_s->conf->filter_rssi)
2715 params.filter_rssi = wpa_s->conf->filter_rssi;
2716
2717 if (wpa_s->sched_scan_plans_num) {
2718 params.sched_scan_plans = wpa_s->sched_scan_plans;
2719 params.sched_scan_plans_num = wpa_s->sched_scan_plans_num;
2720 } else {
2721 /* Set one scan plan that will run infinitely */
2722 if (wpa_s->conf->sched_scan_interval)
2723 scan_plan.interval = wpa_s->conf->sched_scan_interval;
2724 else
2725 scan_plan.interval = 10;
2726
2727 scan_plan.iterations = 0;
2728 params.sched_scan_plans = &scan_plan;
2729 params.sched_scan_plans_num = 1;
2730 }
2731
2732 params.sched_scan_start_delay = wpa_s->conf->sched_scan_start_delay;
2733
2734 if (params.freqs == NULL && wpa_s->manual_sched_scan_freqs) {
2735 wpa_dbg(wpa_s, MSG_DEBUG, "Limit sched scan to specified channels");
2736 params.freqs = wpa_s->manual_sched_scan_freqs;
2737 }
2738
2739 if ((wpa_s->mac_addr_rand_enable & MAC_ADDR_RAND_PNO) &&
2740 wpa_s->wpa_state <= WPA_SCANNING) {
2741 params.mac_addr_rand = 1;
2742 if (wpa_s->mac_addr_pno) {
2743 params.mac_addr = wpa_s->mac_addr_pno;
2744 params.mac_addr_mask = wpa_s->mac_addr_pno + ETH_ALEN;
2745 }
2746 }
2747
2748 wpa_scan_set_relative_rssi_params(wpa_s, &params);
2749
2750 ret = wpa_supplicant_start_sched_scan(wpa_s, &params);
2751 os_free(params.filter_ssids);
2752 if (ret == 0)
2753 wpa_s->pno = 1;
2754 else
2755 wpa_msg(wpa_s, MSG_ERROR, "Failed to schedule PNO");
2756 return ret;
2757}
2758
2759
2760int wpas_stop_pno(struct wpa_supplicant *wpa_s)
2761{
2762 int ret = 0;
2763
2764 if (!wpa_s->pno)
2765 return 0;
2766
2767 ret = wpa_supplicant_stop_sched_scan(wpa_s);
2768 wpa_s->sched_scan_stop_req = 1;
2769
2770 wpa_s->pno = 0;
2771 wpa_s->pno_sched_pending = 0;
2772
2773 if (wpa_s->wpa_state == WPA_SCANNING)
2774 wpa_supplicant_req_scan(wpa_s, 0, 0);
2775
2776 return ret;
2777}
2778
2779
2780void wpas_mac_addr_rand_scan_clear(struct wpa_supplicant *wpa_s,
2781 unsigned int type)
2782{
2783 type &= MAC_ADDR_RAND_ALL;
2784 wpa_s->mac_addr_rand_enable &= ~type;
2785
2786 if (type & MAC_ADDR_RAND_SCAN) {
2787 os_free(wpa_s->mac_addr_scan);
2788 wpa_s->mac_addr_scan = NULL;
2789 }
2790
2791 if (type & MAC_ADDR_RAND_SCHED_SCAN) {
2792 os_free(wpa_s->mac_addr_sched_scan);
2793 wpa_s->mac_addr_sched_scan = NULL;
2794 }
2795
2796 if (type & MAC_ADDR_RAND_PNO) {
2797 os_free(wpa_s->mac_addr_pno);
2798 wpa_s->mac_addr_pno = NULL;
2799 }
2800}
2801
2802
2803int wpas_mac_addr_rand_scan_set(struct wpa_supplicant *wpa_s,
2804 unsigned int type, const u8 *addr,
2805 const u8 *mask)
2806{
2807 u8 *tmp = NULL;
2808
2809 wpas_mac_addr_rand_scan_clear(wpa_s, type);
2810
2811 if (addr) {
2812 tmp = os_malloc(2 * ETH_ALEN);
2813 if (!tmp)
2814 return -1;
2815 os_memcpy(tmp, addr, ETH_ALEN);
2816 os_memcpy(tmp + ETH_ALEN, mask, ETH_ALEN);
2817 }
2818
2819 if (type == MAC_ADDR_RAND_SCAN) {
2820 wpa_s->mac_addr_scan = tmp;
2821 } else if (type == MAC_ADDR_RAND_SCHED_SCAN) {
2822 wpa_s->mac_addr_sched_scan = tmp;
2823 } else if (type == MAC_ADDR_RAND_PNO) {
2824 wpa_s->mac_addr_pno = tmp;
2825 } else {
2826 wpa_printf(MSG_INFO,
2827 "scan: Invalid MAC randomization type=0x%x",
2828 type);
2829 os_free(tmp);
2830 return -1;
2831 }
2832
2833 wpa_s->mac_addr_rand_enable |= type;
2834 return 0;
2835}
2836
2837
2838int wpas_abort_ongoing_scan(struct wpa_supplicant *wpa_s)
2839{
2840 struct wpa_radio_work *work;
2841 struct wpa_radio *radio = wpa_s->radio;
2842
2843 dl_list_for_each(work, &radio->work, struct wpa_radio_work, list) {
2844 if (work->wpa_s != wpa_s || !work->started ||
2845 (os_strcmp(work->type, "scan") != 0 &&
2846 os_strcmp(work->type, "p2p-scan") != 0))
2847 continue;
2848 wpa_dbg(wpa_s, MSG_DEBUG, "Abort an ongoing scan");
2849 return wpa_drv_abort_scan(wpa_s, wpa_s->curr_scan_cookie);
2850 }
2851
2852 wpa_dbg(wpa_s, MSG_DEBUG, "No ongoing scan/p2p-scan found to abort");
2853 return -1;
2854}
2855
2856
2857int wpas_sched_scan_plans_set(struct wpa_supplicant *wpa_s, const char *cmd)
2858{
2859 struct sched_scan_plan *scan_plans = NULL;
2860 const char *token, *context = NULL;
2861 unsigned int num = 0;
2862
2863 if (!cmd)
2864 return -1;
2865
2866 if (!cmd[0]) {
2867 wpa_printf(MSG_DEBUG, "Clear sched scan plans");
2868 os_free(wpa_s->sched_scan_plans);
2869 wpa_s->sched_scan_plans = NULL;
2870 wpa_s->sched_scan_plans_num = 0;
2871 return 0;
2872 }
2873
2874 while ((token = cstr_token(cmd, " ", &context))) {
2875 int ret;
2876 struct sched_scan_plan *scan_plan, *n;
2877
2878 n = os_realloc_array(scan_plans, num + 1, sizeof(*scan_plans));
2879 if (!n)
2880 goto fail;
2881
2882 scan_plans = n;
2883 scan_plan = &scan_plans[num];
2884 num++;
2885
2886 ret = sscanf(token, "%u:%u", &scan_plan->interval,
2887 &scan_plan->iterations);
2888 if (ret <= 0 || ret > 2 || !scan_plan->interval) {
2889 wpa_printf(MSG_ERROR,
2890 "Invalid sched scan plan input: %s", token);
2891 goto fail;
2892 }
2893
2894 if (scan_plan->interval > wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plan_interval) {
2895 wpa_printf(MSG_WARNING,
2896 "scan plan %u: Scan interval too long(%u), use the maximum allowed(%u)",
2897 num, scan_plan->interval,
2898 wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plan_interval);
2899 scan_plan->interval =
2900 wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plan_interval;
2901 }
2902
2903 if (ret == 1) {
2904 scan_plan->iterations = 0;
2905 break;
2906 }
2907
2908 if (!scan_plan->iterations) {
2909 wpa_printf(MSG_ERROR,
2910 "scan plan %u: Number of iterations cannot be zero",
2911 num);
2912 goto fail;
2913 }
2914
2915 if (scan_plan->iterations >
2916 wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plan_iterations) {
2917 wpa_printf(MSG_WARNING,
2918 "scan plan %u: Too many iterations(%u), use the maximum allowed(%u)",
2919 num, scan_plan->iterations,
2920 wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plan_iterations);
2921 scan_plan->iterations =
2922 wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plan_iterations;
2923 }
2924
2925 wpa_printf(MSG_DEBUG,
2926 "scan plan %u: interval=%u iterations=%u",
2927 num, scan_plan->interval, scan_plan->iterations);
2928 }
2929
2930 if (!scan_plans) {
2931 wpa_printf(MSG_ERROR, "Invalid scan plans entry");
2932 goto fail;
2933 }
2934
2935 if (cstr_token(cmd, " ", &context) || scan_plans[num - 1].iterations) {
2936 wpa_printf(MSG_ERROR,
2937 "All scan plans but the last must specify a number of iterations");
2938 goto fail;
2939 }
2940
2941 wpa_printf(MSG_DEBUG, "scan plan %u (last plan): interval=%u",
2942 num, scan_plans[num - 1].interval);
2943
2944 if (num > wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plans) {
2945 wpa_printf(MSG_WARNING,
2946 "Too many scheduled scan plans (only %u supported)",
2947 wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plans);
2948 wpa_printf(MSG_WARNING,
2949 "Use only the first %u scan plans, and the last one (in infinite loop)",
2950 wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plans - 1);
2951 os_memcpy(&scan_plans[wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plans - 1],
2952 &scan_plans[num - 1], sizeof(*scan_plans));
2953 num = wpa_s->max_sched_scan_plans;
2954 }
2955
2956 os_free(wpa_s->sched_scan_plans);
2957 wpa_s->sched_scan_plans = scan_plans;
2958 wpa_s->sched_scan_plans_num = num;
2959
2960 return 0;
2961
2962fail:
2963 os_free(scan_plans);
2964 wpa_printf(MSG_ERROR, "invalid scan plans list");
2965 return -1;
2966}
2967
2968
2969/**
2970 * wpas_scan_reset_sched_scan - Reset sched_scan state
2971 * @wpa_s: Pointer to wpa_supplicant data
2972 *
2973 * This function is used to cancel a running scheduled scan and to reset an
2974 * internal scan state to continue with a regular scan on the following
2975 * wpa_supplicant_req_scan() calls.
2976 */
2977void wpas_scan_reset_sched_scan(struct wpa_supplicant *wpa_s)
2978{
2979 wpa_s->normal_scans = 0;
2980 if (wpa_s->sched_scanning) {
2981 wpa_s->sched_scan_timed_out = 0;
2982 wpa_s->prev_sched_ssid = NULL;
2983 wpa_supplicant_cancel_sched_scan(wpa_s);
2984 }
2985}
2986
2987
2988void wpas_scan_restart_sched_scan(struct wpa_supplicant *wpa_s)
2989{
2990 /* simulate timeout to restart the sched scan */
2991 wpa_s->sched_scan_timed_out = 1;
2992 wpa_s->prev_sched_ssid = NULL;
2993 wpa_supplicant_cancel_sched_scan(wpa_s);
2994}
